name: DIA-style.com
tag_list: start-up, fashion, luxury, apparel, accessories, non-apparel, net-a-porter, social-commerce, middle-east, arabic, e-commerce, etail, online-retail, digital, luxury-brands, burberry, chanel, saudi-arabia, dubai, kuwait, uae, moda-operandi, emerging-markets
description: Fashion social commerce for Middle East
overview:
Social commerce site for luxury fashion focusing on the Middle East markets. The site is in both English and Arabic.

DIA-style.com enables users to easily search and shop online for 50,000 plus women’s ready-to-wear and accessories from over 1,200 global brands within a single platform. The site also offers creative and social PLAY and TALK functions via its community pages.

DIA-style.com partners with top global luxury etailers for its product offering of on-season, on-trend product from the hottest brands.

The company is the brainchild of ex banker and INSEAD graduate Rasha Khouri who has a passion for technology, fashion and the region. Her team includes former senior marketing and communications executives from luxury brands Burberry and Pringle.
